name: Nelsons Stone
description: I am an out-spoken man who loves to have fun with the right people to be with,I could be so selective and some of my colleagues do see a big deal in that but i don’t because i think that make you do the necessary things you ought to do as a real man.I am looking for a man to spend the rest of my life loving and caring for if the woman wants something like that but the only thing that can make that work is if actually the woman to be with a man ”LIKE” me and the attitude towards that determines that,I believe their is this woman out there that is meant for me and ”IF YOU ARE NOT THE WOMAN PLEASE DON’T BOTHER TO STOP BY AND CHECK OUT MY PROFILE”LOL….I don’t mind having a conversation and start up with friendship ”IF YOU’RE REAL AND WANTS TO BE WITH A MAN LIKE ME”
